title: British Columbiaâ€™s Wild Salmon Strategy
summary: The document outlines British Columbia's strategy for restoring healthy and abundant wild salmon populations. The strategy involves engaging experts and stakeholders across the province to develop an action plan. The process includes the development of an options paper, public consultation, creation of a strategic framework, and implementation of the plan.
date: July to March (no specific year mentioned)
impact: The policy aims to restore healthy and abundant wild salmon populations in British Columbia, which could have positive impacts on the economy, coastal communities, indigenous peoples, and coastal ecosystems.
